meanings.definition: A design or illustration created by cutting lines into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed her intricate linecuts at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make linecuts in my art class.
meanings.sent3: The linecuts on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her linecuts were like a map leading to hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The linecuts on the paper were so precise, they seemed to dance.

meanings.definition: The act of cutting lines into a surface to create a design or illustration.
meanings.sent1: Careful linecuts are essential for creating detailed artwork.
meanings.sent2: He used linecuts to bring his vision to life on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The linecuts in the sand turned out to be a surprise message.
meanings.sent4: Her linecuts were like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The linecuts on the wood revealed a hidden image when put together.
